job.title: Data Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description: Job Title:Â Data EngineerPosition Type: Contract until December 2021 (2.5 Months)Location: 100% remote, no travel, prefer Central or East Coast location since a lot of the team onshore work East Coast. Primary Skills: 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure Python, Scala, SQL and/or Databricks hands on experience Requirements: At least 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure.Must have python, scala, SQL and/or databricks hands on experience.Should be independent worker but collaborate with necessary peers and deliver results incrementally by taking full ownership of tasks.Â Daily duties: 1.Â Â Â Â Â Gen 1 to Gen 2 transitiona)Â Â Â Â Â Majority of their data pipelines are using Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 1 which is going to be deprecated by Microsoftb)Â Â Â Â Â Hence they need to migrate this to ADLS Gen 2 versionc)Â Â Â Â Â Approximately, 155 data pipelines will be impacted from an ingestion pov and another 30 pipelines will also need to be updated in Refined data process2.Â Â Â Â Â Data Quality automationa)Â Â Â Â Â Today, they have several notebooks and scripts that perform aggregate quality checks for multiple sourcesb)Â Â Â Â Â Some of these need to be upgraded to use more current pipeline run information and also needs automationc)Â Â Â Â Â They will utilize ADLSg2 to store this metadata for reporting and analysis 3.Â Â Â Â Â Functions optimization and Vacuum implementationa)Â Â Â Â Â There are Azure Functions based processes that needs update and optimization as each of them are running independentlyb)Â Â Â Â Â Opportunity to modularize some of these functions and as a result reduce overhead on system resourcesÂ
